flawed_nl_solution:
Cole has to pay 3 * 9 = $<<3*9=27>>27 for one side of the side fence.
For the shared left fence, he has to pay two-thirds of 27, so he has to pay 27 * 2 / 3 = $<<27*2/3=81>>81.
The shared back fence will cost 3 * 18 = $<<3*18=54>>54.
He has to pay for half the back fence, so it will cost 54 / 2 = $<<54/2=27>>27.
Thus, Cole has to pay 81 + 27 + 27 = $<<81+27+27=135>>135 for the fence.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18.0, not 81.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
